Uses of Class
com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form.DialogContextMemberInfo

Packages that use DialogContextMemberInfo
com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form Provides advanced HTML forms functionality; this includes the complete specification of dialogs in a XML-based resource format and execution of dialogs in Java classes or JSP (using a supplied tag-lib), fully interactive and user-extensible validation, skinnable look-and-feel, caching of dialog collections, and unlimited number of extended field types. 
com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form.field Provides the customizable fields that are added to Dialogs; Dialogs are HTML forms that contain one or more of the DialogField instances such as TextField, BooleanField, or SelectField. 
 

Uses of DialogContextMemberInfo in com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form

          Produces Java code when a custom DialogContext is created
 DialogContextMemberInfo DialogField.getDialogContextMemberInfo()
          Produces Java code when a custom DialogContext is created The default method produces nothing; all the subclasses must define what they need.
